description: The Committee decided to conclude the reduction of its aggregate securities holdings in August, two months earlier than previously indicated.
justification: Ending balance sheet runoff earlier than planned provides slight additional accommodation by maintaining the size of the balance sheet sooner.

description: The Committee directed the Desk to reinvest all principal payments from Treasury securities, agency debt, and agency MBS starting August 1, maintaining the size of the balance sheet.
justification: Maintaining balance sheet size through reinvestments rather than allowing continued runoff provides slight accommodation.

description: The Board approved reductions to the primary credit rate and rates for secondary and seasonal credit consistent with the federal funds rate cut.
justification: Technical adjustment that supports the implementation of the federal funds rate cut, providing slight accommodation.

description: The Board approved adjustments to interest rates on reserves consistent with the federal funds rate reduction.
justification: Technical adjustment that supports the implementation of the federal funds rate cut, providing slight accommodation.

description: The Committee decided to lower the target range for the federal funds rate by 25 basis points to 2 to 2-1/4 percent.
justification: A 25 basis point rate cut provides moderate accommodation to support economic expansion and address global headwinds and muted inflation pressures.

description: The Committee adopted modified communication language stating "As the Committee contemplates the future path for the target range for the federal funds rate, it will continue to monitor the implications of incoming information for the economic outlook and will act as appropriate to sustain the expansion."
justification: The language maintains an accommodative stance while creating optionality, suggesting continued willingness to ease if conditions warrant.
